showScoreExcerpt:
"Directed by Sam Gold, the play moves quickly but is not without flaws. Most directors find it necessary to make Shakepearean shows unique, to put their own stamp on them. ... Sometimes the gimmicks throw off the mood. In the midst of some soul-searching and agonizing, Macbeth opens a Lite beer."
